protein.specific_function: Guanine nucleotide-binding proteins (G proteins) are involved as modulators or transducers in various transmembrane signaling systems

go_class.description: cell surface receptor linked signaling pathway
g-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway

reference.reference_text: Chan AM, Fleming TP, McGovern ES, Chedid M, Miki T, Aaronson SA: Expression cDNA cloning of a transforming gene encoding the wild-type G alpha 12 gene product. Mol Cell Biol. 1993 Feb;13(2):762-8.
